articles.title: US says it foiled alleged plot to assassinate Sikh activist in New York - BBC.com
articles.description: The suspect tried to hire a hitman to kill an American citizen in New York, prosecutors say.
articles.content:
By Phil McCauslandBBC News, New York
A photograph from the indictment showing the alleged first payment for the murder-for-hire plot

articles.author: Suzanne O'Malley
articles.title: The Golden Bachelor’s Not-So-Golden Past - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Secret girlfriends, a juiced-up résumé and the selling of a septuagenarian stud: The secret history of America’s senior sweetheart, Gerry Turner.
